scripts.install-all: npm i && npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.all: concurrently " npm run client " " npm run server " " npm run ws2 "
scripts.docker:client: cd client && docker build  --no-cache -f Dockerfile.prod -t gehlotnikhil38/code_frontend:v3 .
scripts.docker:server: cd server && docker build  --no-cache -f Dockerfile.prod -t gehlotnikhil38/code_backend:v3 .
scripts.docker:ws2: cd ws2 && docker build  --no-cache -f Dockerfile.prod -t gehlotnikhil38/code_ws2:v3 .
scripts.docker:build-image: concurrently " npm run docker:client " " npm run docker:server " " npm run docker:ws2 "
